EmailTemplate.name: New Partner Onboarding.PAR Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Registering your BigCommerce deals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We hope by now you've had a chance to browse your partner portal and see the exciting new resources at your disposal
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Looking to register a new deal? Simply log into your partner portal and click the “Register a Deal” button at the top right of your screen, or use the quick link on the left side of the screen or on the Getting Started page.
Register a deal now <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/]]>
Questions about deal registration? Sign up for an onboarding webinar <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Portal-Webinar-Register.html]]>.
Thank you,
The BigCommerce Partner Team partnersupport@bigcommerce.com
